markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Nirmathi Guerrilla](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=66)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Eye of Dread

</column>

Woodcraft comes naturally to you, and you have learned how to use the forest to your tactical advantage against superior forces in skirmishes against the Molthuni army or the Ironfang Legion.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) skill, and the [Forest Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Terrain Stalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=852) (underbrush) skill feat.
name: Nirmathi Guerrilla

text: Nirmathi Guerrilla Source World Guide pg. 46 2.0 Region Eye of Dread Woodcraft comes naturally to you, and you have learned how to use the forest to your tactical advantage against superior forces in skirmishes against the Molthuni army or the Ironfang Legion. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Stealth skill, and the Forest Lore skill. You gain the Terrain Stalker (underbrush) skill feat.
